description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a Q&A session page that allows users to ask questions about a stock symbol, fetches answers from a provider, and displays the response.

classes.name: QASessionPage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the Q&A session interface for a specific stock symbol.

classes.name: QASessionArgs
classes.description: A class holding arguments (stock symbol) passed to the QASessionPage.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for this widget.

methods.name: _ask
methods.description: Asynchronously sends the user's question to the provider and updates the UI with the answer.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the Q&A session page, including input field, button, and answer display.
